title: Ride and share
desc: This app aims to provide a completely community driven ride sharing services, in which people have freedom to exchange trip infomation and ride together.
Besides MERN stack, this app used Google Map API to predict and autocomplete location address and utilized Socket.io library to enable real-time communication.

title: Portfolio_v2
desc: This portfolio web site is a rework for my original portfolio web site which is built with jQuery and css. It's fully interactive with rich animation and minimalist design. Thanks to React Virtual DOM, new portfolio site is speedy fast, powerful and fun to use.
